SEARCH
Module com.example.flashcardai
Package db.DAO

Class DeckDAO

java.lang.Object
db.DAO.DeckDAO
public class DeckDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for performing CRUD operations on the 'decks' table. Provides methods for inserting, retrieving, updating, and deleting flashcard decks. Also supports creating test decks and retrieving decks with flashcards for test data purposes.

This class relies on DBConnector for database connections and operates on Deck objects.

  • Method Details

    • insertDeck

      public static int insertDeck(int userId, String title, String description)
      Inserts a new deck for a specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user creating the deck
      title - the title of the deck
      description - a brief description of the deck
      Returns:
      the generated deck ID if successful; -1 otherwise

    • getDecksByUserId

      public static List<Deck> getDecksByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves all decks belonging to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of Deck objects associated with the user

    • getDeckById

      public static Deck getDeckById(int deckId)
      Retrieves a single deck by its ID.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck
      Returns:
      a Deck object if found; null otherwise

    • renameDeck

      public static boolean renameDeck(int deckId, String newTitle, String newDesc)
      Renames an existing deck and updates its description.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck to update
      newTitle - the new title for the deck
      newDesc - the new description for the deck
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful; false otherwise

    • deleteDeck

      public static boolean deleteDeck(int deckId)
      Deletes a deck by its ID.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful; false otherwise

    • getAllDecks

      public static Deck[] getAllDecks()
      Retrieves all decks in the system. Intended for administrative or testing purposes.
      Returns:
      an array of all Deck objects in the database

    • insertTestDeckWithCards

      public static void insertTestDeckWithCards(int userId)
      Inserts a test deck and pre-defined flashcards for a given user. This is useful for populating demo or debug environments.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who will own the test deck

    • deleteDeckById

      public static boolean deleteDeckById(int deckId)
      Deletes a deck and all associated flashcards by the deck's ID. This operation is transactional to ensure consistency.
      Parameters:
      deckId - the ID of the deck to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deck and its flashcards were successfully deleted; false otherwise
